Credit Line: Brooklyn Museum Costume Collection at The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Gift of the Brooklyn Museum, 2009; Brooklyn Museum Collection
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1900 A.D.–present
Description: James used this unique wing-like fan form to accessorize his dresses in numerous fashion spreads between 1935 and 1949. Wing-like protrusions and forms were a consistent element of the design vocabulary seen in his dresses.
